articles.content: 7:58am, 16 June 2020Newcastle Knights have re-signed Kalyn Ponga for four seasons. The deal is believed to be worth around $4.4million, which will make Ponga one of the highest-paid players in the NR… [+1847 chars]

articles.title: Players can terminate contracts after NRL bans top agent Isaac Moses - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Isaac Moses has had his accreditation cancelled after advising Tim Mannah to give 'false evidence' during the Parramatta Eels salary-cap investigations.
articles.content: Moses, who manages some of the biggest names in the NRL, including Cameron Smith and nephew Mitchell Moses, faces the possibility of a mass exodus as the game's stars contemplate seeking hundreds of … [+2673 chars]

articles.title: Steven Gerrard says Liverpool must give ‘best coach in the world’ Klopp a statue for winning Premier League - Fox Sports
articles.description: For many years, Steven Gerrard carried the weight of Liverpool’s great dream on his shoulders. He came within touching distance of breaking the proud club’s Premier League title drought, but never quite made it.
articles.content: Now the former Reds captain has spoken out on his hometown sides incredible season so far, and the all-but-certain prospect of Liverpool raising the title. And, he says, the club should start buildin… [+5495 chars]
